effect.gold_silver: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.
effect.crystal: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.

short_effect.gold_silver: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.
short_effect.crystal: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.

flavor_text.gold_silver: Hits three times with rising power.
flavor_text.crystal: Hits three times with rising power.
